project_path.VCG: contracts/VCGamers Full Smart Contract Security Audit/VCG

findings.title: Owner Privileges
findings.description: The owner of the contract has excessive privileges, allowing them to change tax rates, tax collectors, exclude certain addresses from fees, distribute collected taxes manually, and modify team, RND, and partnership fee rates and addresses.
